name: Firbolg
description: Firbolgs are reclusive giant-kin who prefer to live in harmony with nature, far from other sentient races. They are guardians of the woodlands and gentle souls.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Firbolg Magic
traits.description: You can cast Detect Magic and Disguise Self with this trait. Once you cast either spell, you can’t cast it again until you finish a short or long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Hidden Step
traits.description: As a bonus action, you can magically turn invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack, make a damage roll, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
traits.description: You have the ability to communicate in a limited manner with beasts and plants. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.
